item.title: Predicting housing prices in Ames, Iowa - Captsone Project for Coursera Statistics with R Specialization
item.description: Description Part 1 - Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) Exploratory Data Analysis Part 2 - Development and assessment of an initial model, following a semi-guided process of analysis Section 2.1 An Initial Model Section 2.2 Model Selection Section 2.3 Initial Model Residuals Section 2.4 Initial Model RMSE Section 2.5 Overfitting Part 3 Development of a Final Model Section 3.1 Final Model Section 3.2 Transformation Section 3.3 Variable Interaction Section 3.
